instructions:
Sauté the onion in margarine in a small frying pan for about 5 minutes. Combine flour, thyme, salt and
pepper and sprinkle over the onion and margarine and stir and cook for about 2 minutes. Combine milk,
broth and Worcestershire sauce and add to the flour-onion mixture. Stir the sauce until smooth and cook till
thick and bubbly. In a small bowl combine and mix the ground roast beef with the sauce and refrigerate for 2
hours.
Form 3 patties, dredge in flour, dip in egg, coat with bread crumbs and fry in Crisco over medium/low
heat for about 3 minutes on a side.
name: Beef Croquettes
